statements: UPDATE leadership_metrics SET team_size = 10, communication_score = 8.5 WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE leadership_metrics SET productivity_score = 7.9, team_size = 15 WHERE leader_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE LeadershipMetrics SET metric_value = 8.5 WHERE leader_name = 'John Doe' AND metric_type = 'Communication'
UPDATE LeadershipFeedback SET feedback_description = 'Positive feedback on teamwork skills' , feedback_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE leader_name = 'Jane Smith'

UPDATE LeadershipEffectivenessMetrics SET communication_rating = 9, motivation_rating = 8 WHERE employee_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
